title: MOO! - Free Font
content:
Hello, people!  
I've just released MOO!, a free typeface.

[Have a look.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718223848/http:/loligovulgaris.com/?p=290)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [moo\_01.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718223848/http:/typophile.com/files/moo_01.png) | 328.67 KB |
author: scannerlicker

comments.content: This is fun! The default spacing is too tight for my tastes, but nothing that a little tracking won't fix.

I'm on Windows and I noticed in WordPad that composite glyphs such as C with cedilla accent aren't decomposed.

But then again, what kind of designer which use WordPad anyway. :D

Can't seem to post a new topic of a blog. Maybe a comment will work...

Dave Nalle  
 [Scriptorium Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718223848/http:/www.fontcraft.com/)
